## Query.deleteMany() method

Deletes all matched documents

**Signature:**

```typescript
deleteMany(query: QueryExecutorDeleteQuery, options?: QueryDeleteManyOptions): this;
```

## Example


```ts
const query = new Query(idb, "store-name");
await query.deleteMany({ $key: key }, options);
```
